entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't mark compiler-generated backing fields for reflection in ILLink #102856
  • Linux-Bionic OpenSSL headers hack incompatible with OpenSSL 3.x #102851
  • Exception in BlazorWasm applications due to NullabilityInfoContext usage #102848
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeHelpers.IsReferenceOrContainsReferences should be `where T : allows ref struct` #102847
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] conflicting signatures for UCO #102844
    9.0.0
  • Crash while jitting System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests in `Rationalizer::RewriteHWIntrinsicAsUserCall` #102840
    9.0.0
  • Tensor tests failing under jitstress with "Assertion failed 'gtEntryPoint == nullptr'" #102839
    9.0.0
  • Unable to add trimming tests for OOB assemblies #102837
  • [Performance] Regression in multiple scenarios, Linux, more significant on ARM64 #102832
  • ILLink analyzer recognizes `&&` and `||`, but neither trimmer or ilc do #102830
  • How NRBF Payload Reader should read DateTimes? #102826
  • Redundant moves with small values in some cases #102824
  • WPA can't decode ETW events from some of the Private.InternalDiagnostics.* event sources #102820
  • Source generators should be able to handle C# 13 extensions #102817
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `GetKeyedService` overload that takes a `System.Type` #102816
  • Type.IsSerializable and FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized are marked with Obsolete in .NET 8 #102809
  • if NamePipeClientStream pipename have “~” can't connect #102807
  • Applications missing DLL Files after automatic update #102804
  • [API Proposal]: Add the ability to trim custom attributes #102802
  • outerloop: System.IO.Tests on linux-musl-x64 AOT running into SIGKILL #102800
  • System.Threading.Timer stops working after 49.7days in dotnet 7.0.10 with mono-vm #102798
  • App throws TypeLoadException when published trimmed but works fine when published native AOT (no trim warnings) #102796
    9.0.0
  • UnsafeAccessor throws MissingFieldException on enum fields #102792
    9.0.0

Closed

  • HttpClient.PostAsJsonAsync Extensions missing Content-Type Header #102855
  • DispatchProxy throws TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102716
    9.0.0
  • String.Split does not work well with slashes #102841
  • HW intrinsics: Poor codegen for operations requiring imm8 when the value is calculated to constant during JIT #11062
    Future
  • Self-hosted agent on M2 hangs when building MAUI on NET6 / NET7 / NET8 #95704
  • `ServiceCollection` class ambiguous reference in v.8.0.1 w/ Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection v8.0.0 #102703
  • [API Proposal]: Trim method for string #102822
  • Missing HTTP header sanitization when reading values from `/etc/os-release` #102819
    Future
  • Problems using the Profiler API #102821
  • [API Proposal]: Regex Streaming Mode #102221
  • [API Proposal]: Assembly.SetEntryAssembly() #101616
    9.0.0
  • Add Persian language for DayOfWeek of PersianCalendar class #102779
  • Serialization not supported Exception in .Net Core #89811
    Future
  • Several LINQ classes implement IList<T> but raise on any mutating method #102825
  • ILC: Assertion failed '(unsigned)reg < ArrLen(regMasks)' in '...' during 'Generate code' (IL size 6; hash 0x04901a61; FullOpts) #102715
  • [7.0] System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests.PerformanceCounter_Increment failed due to file being used by another process. #98191
  • Bypass the certificate security check for localhost makes calls to valid https host throw exception #102106
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/0582/csgen.1/csgen.1.cmd #102296
    9.0.0
  • Trim analyzer doesn't warn on mismatched annotations through method group conversions #95258
    9.0.0
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #76410
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix `UnsafeAccessor`s with enum fields #102853
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Fix STJ support for System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported = false #102852
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Keep metadata for rooted members in ILLink #102850
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Revert linux_bionic image to unblock the official build #102849
    area-Infrastructure
  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #102846
    needs-area-label
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that GenTreeIntrinsic doesn't incorrectly overwrite the gtEntryPoint #102843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable binder tracing test under jitstress #102842
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add regression test for assembly origin for event marking #102836
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Delete -fms-extensions from coreclr native build #102834
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make span args to SearchValues.Create be params #102831
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid SerialPort IOLoop when there's no event handlers #102829
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Baseline failing reflection and Regressions tests #102812
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate `LCL_ADDR` nodes during local morph #102808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Optimize HttpUtility.UrlEncodeToBytes for (string, Encoding) overload. #102805
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Remove debug symbols from non-symbols ilc package #102803
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102801
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Propagate the 'this' keyword in LibraryImports #102793
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • Avoid reporting new callstack chain on exceptions #102774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move Y2038 doc into docs/design/features #102854
    needs-area-label
  • Add Y2038 design #102835
    area-Meta
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded LoaderAllocator #102797
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.StoreNonTemporal() #102769
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix DispatchProxy throwing TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102718
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix OpenSSL stores refreshing too frequently #102838
    area-System.Security
  • Update build scripts for tests and native-binplace for mono scenarios. #102833
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Use azl3 images for all current Mariner images #102775
    area-Infrastructure
  • Relax type layout check #102810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make SubstitutedILProvider more resilient to bad IL #102799
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make CreateAppHost test use TestArtifact instead of its own class #102625
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Optimize allocations in HttpUtility.UrlDecodeToBytes for smaller inputs. #102753
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use stackalloc char&byte arrays for decoding Url values in HttpUtiliy.ParseQueryString #102745
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the use of a term #102828
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve Ascii.FromUtf16 and FromHexString #102735
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Backport #102613 to preview 5 #102778
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Delete __if_exists #102277
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • don't return ConnectOperation as we are not pooling it #102776
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Make constructors private for parts of the ComInterfaceGenerator that should only be created from their static methods #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • NativeAOT/linux/arm: Fix native linux/arm failure #102760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LSRA: Make genRegMask() return `regMaskTP` #102783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use floating tags for 1ES pt #102771
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Keep delegate alive during invocation #102159
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • Align reflection name formatting with CoreCLR-JIT #102756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #102700
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to support rewriting more complex intrinsics as user calls #102702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some comment typos #101232
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Disable test csgen.1 for windows x86 #102794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add some more `#ifdef BACKGROUND_GC` to enable compilation for Wasm #102750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add test for dataflow in local method group passed as argument to delegate #102782
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #102376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • Avoid new constraint with structs in ILLink analyzer #102784
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `Activator.CreateInstance` supports ByRefLike types #102636
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2462847 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect metadata token written for array, pointer populated from TypeBuilder #102786
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fill in FeatureCheckDataflow.cs assertions with issue links #102679
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents #102238
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102063
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Migrate more ghashtables to simdhash #102476
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Connect align instruction after a label gets possibly added #102789
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Make ToDictionary() selectors parallel. #100590
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution
  • Switch to AllowByRefLike naming in Mono as well #102516
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [NO REVIEW]Activate some H/3 tests and make usage of ConfigureAwait(false) more consistent on H/3 #102699
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #102053
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] LLVM version synchronization and verification #2599
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove WASI-SDK pthread.h hack #2598

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] avaliable in .Net 9? #2597

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add official build pipeline for `dotnet-experimental` feed #2590

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge may24 #2591
  • tweaks to enable NativeAOT-LLVM on Linux with WASI-SDK 22 #2592
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected packages in the SDK's MSBuild Sdk resolution folder #41248
  • CSHTML compile errors after 8.0.5 ( 8.0.300 ) #41245

Closed

  • Performance of `dotnet format` is very bad compared to `dotnet-format` #39124
  • Clean-up CODEOWNERS file #40739
  • Download cmake failure when running restore.cmd #40859

PullRequests

Created

  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #41247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Make SDK produced template nupkgs lowercase #41242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix localization in .NET Workload Information Display #41225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Revert linker to last known good for preview 5 release #41222
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Fix CodeOwners file #41216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix build-configuration.json upload #41212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for PreferNativeArm64 #40895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added missing -nativeToolsOnMachine #41218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • YaoJunFeng #8165

Updated

  • Proposal: Ternary comparison operator #4108
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #8167

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069
  • Add betterness rule for first-class Span #8149

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change Workspace.Option setter to throw NotSupportedException #73778
    17.12
  • Account for partial properties at existing use sites of partial method symbol APIs #73772
  • Visual Studio 2022 adds a duplicate "Option Strict On" to Code File When Pasting VB.NET Code #73771
  • IDE0036 not raised for `protected private` and `internal protected` members #73768
    Backlog
  • Programación #73767
  • Reporting Roslyn analyzer name is inaccessible through Error list entry in VSSDK for VisualStudio 2022 17.10 #73763
  • Colelction Expression Compile Error after upgrading to SDK 8.0.3. #73761
  • Regression: static initializer not run on class (worked with the old .NET Framework compiler) #73759

Closed

  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet is not offered after lambda's arrow #72266
  • "Use primary constructor" does not produce a diagnostic for an empty public parameterless constructor #73695
  • C# Interactive Window with internals #12450
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Move LanguageServer out of Features directory #73779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue where FAR results were not getting sent until they were fully complete #73777
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73774
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Partial properties 10 #73773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prefer implicit span conversions #73765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Consider extension receiver conversion when reducing #73762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73776
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Pause a short while before computing if fixes or refactorings are available at a particular line #73755
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Clean up replay docs #73775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • On the fly docs exclusion #73770
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: allow `cw` snippet in void-returning lambdas #73706
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we were querying a linq expression over and over #73750
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support 'use primary constructor' on no-parameter constructors with attributes #73769
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fewer exceptions #73766
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Debugger.Contracts to 17.11.0-beta.24274.2 #73748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Run providers in parallel when determining if we should show the lightbulb icon #73758
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change the DocumentationCommentId to use a PooledStringBuilder #73737
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update config after snap 17.11 Preview 2 #73754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove explicit GC calls in the asset cache #73752
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code style options cleanup #73744
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement alg that determines which projects need to be restarted/rebuilt due to rude edits #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option2) #73726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Restore RazorCompiler EA layer for desktop #73697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use a more sensible MEF export for brace completion #73756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interactive Blazor application doesn't work when accessed through "Dev Tunnels" #55962
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext_spring #55959
  • Retry CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser #55954
  • dotnet watch with hot reload reloads app when file added to bin #55952
  • Windows Server Hosting Bundle does not remove previous installation during upgrade #55950
  • How to use QueryHelpers outside Asp.net core? [Additional information] #55947
  • No angular template on ubuntu? #55943
  • Phantom app_offline.htm Detection Events and Application Shutdowns #55939

Closed

  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove default tag with the assembly name from OpenAPI document (#55884 ) #55906
  • Blazor Authorization - AuthorizeRouteView NotAuthorized tag not triggered when directly accessing /auth from address bar in the browser #55911
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55922
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #55942
  • blazor headcontent throws exception #54842
    9.0-preview6
  • JsonPolymorphic not respected in request DTOs #55956
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55861
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #55874
  • Quarantine CacheTagHelper_AllowsVaryingByUICulture #55930
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #55873
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55880
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #55886
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #55889
  • Retry ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveDifferentMessageSizesWebSocketsTransport #55918
  • `HealthCheckServiceCollectionExtensions.AddHealthChecks` overload that takes a `Action<HealthCheckOptions>` #54800
  • Support serving of pre-GZIP encoded files #2458
    Backlog
  • Invalid auto-generated code when publishing with PublishTrimmed=true #53326
  • Perf regression: json #55921

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analyzer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API mediapicker to take photo without user tap on take photo button #22723

    9.0-preview7

  • Picker not opening when calling Focus() in .NET MAUI #22701
  • IsEnabled=False in RefreshView is inherited by child controls. (Was not the case with Xamarin) #22699
  • [Windows] WebView2 not handling DOM events properly #22697
  • Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.IImage Downsize function rotates images in Android only #22696
  • [MAUI]When the edit content fills the edit box, the latest input content is not displayed #22695

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to add arbitrary queries to run within the same transaction as SaveChanges? #33845
  • EF forgets how to serialize an enum in a JsonColumn, you have to remind it and the error message is not helpful #33843
  • wrong generated query #33839
    9.0.0
  • New Provider: Overriding the generation of bool predicate for short circuiting #33838
  • Add interceptors as generic types to the DbContext #33837
  • Make a rollback argument for migrations that rollback last migration #33834
    Backlog
  • Query: add better documentation explaining how to use instancePropagatesNullability and argumentsPropagateNullability on SqlFunctionExpression #33833
  • Error: Value cannot be null parameter name key #33831

Closed

  • Performance got downgraded in context.Database.EnsureCreatedAsync() after Microsoft.Data.SqlClient upgrade from version 5.1.1 to 5.1.4(5.1.1-->5.1.4) #33847
  • Sqlite.FunctionalTests intermittently crash on MacOS #33785
    9.0.0
  • Mapping an aggregate user-defined function (TimescaleDB first/last) #33844
  • Any release notes for 8.0.6 ? #33830
  • Unsafe accessors failing for backing fields in 9.0-preview5 #33828

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update Azure.Identity #33842
  • Disable source indexing #33841
  • Update to SDK 9.0.100-preview.4.24267.66 #33840
  • Implement nullability computation for `SqlFunctionExpression` #33814
  • re-enabling sqlite tests on macos now that ci was updated #33832
  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #33846
  • Check arity consistency when constructing `SqlFunctionExpression`s #33815
  • Implement sum and average aggregation for `decimal` in SQLite #33721
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33746
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update all packages to latest preview5 #33836

Updated

  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524
  • Minor improvement of `SqlServerParameterBasedSqlProcessor.Optimize` #33758
  • When creating the "missing column" error message, use the same (case insensitive) column name comparer used in field value retrieval #33749
  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
